feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
